TopicTitle: When will the next forums update be?

Articles.Content: The forums have encountered many software updates through its life, when do you think will the next be?
The roadmap is usually laid out on the Invision website, whether the PD IT department chooses to implement them is another question.

We are looking into a new forum update, but it unfortunately requires some coding work to be done, and the PD IT department is overwhelmed at the moment, so we don't have an ETA yet, but it is something we are looking into!

9 minutes ago, Ghostii_Space said:

We are looking into a new forum update, but it unfortunately requires some coding work to be done, and the PD IT department is overwhelmed at the moment, so we don't have an ETA yet, but it is something we are looking into! 

Egads!

I mean, Yay?!
